#summary Using OpenMalaria

= Introduction =

*openmalaria* is a simulator designed to model the cost and effectiveness of interventions against the _plasmodium falciparum_ malaria parasite. These simulations can be run on both a [http://malariacontrol.net/ large] and small (PC) scale.

Documented here:

 * [SetupOverview Installing] *openmalaria* and using it to run some example scenarios
 * How to [ScenarioDesign design and configure] experimental scenarios
 * Some guidance on how simulator results might be analyzed
